name: Junk! (itch)
description:
Junk! is a space arcade game in where you play as an astronaut collecting space junk. The goal of the game is to collect as much junk as possible and survive.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

X: Shoot Gas

Spacebar: Pause

Mouse: Click Buttons

I hope you enjoy Junk! and I hope you look forward to my future games. And don't forget to comment and review Junk. Enjoy!

Click here to listen to Junk!'s OST:
